title: The Golden Rendezvous
description: MURDER FOR MILLIONAIRESA luxury cruise ... A missing atomic scientist ... A hidden nuclear device ... A very rich and beautiful woman ...A band of desperate hijackers ... A ship of gold.Put them all together with First Officer John Carter, tough, shrewd, resourceful, and you have a fantastic blend of suspense â€“ adventure and international intrigue.
author: Alistair MacLean
